name: core-submission
description: core.io Submission Server and optional Dovecot Proxy

root_authorized_keys.description: SSH public key(s) for the root user

syslog_host.description: syslog server IP address and port seperated by colon

mail_auth_user.description: smtp username if authentication is required

mail_adminaddr.description: admin email address alias for all mails to root@localhost

api_redis_addr.description: ip or hostname of api server, ip addresses requires squared brackets

api_redis_key.description: base64 encoded spipe key for api server

submission_ssl.description: ssl cert, key and CA for smtp in pem format

proxy_mbox_ssl.description: ssl certificate for proxy to imap/pop server

proxy_mbox_host.description: hostname of real imap/pop server (only ssl is supported)
